TopicTitle: Video Wednesdays: Kerbal Space Program is Just Awesome

Articles.Content:
<p><img alt="image" src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_n3djelvps31rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="360" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/8-ca8AYblFg" width="640"></iframe></p>

<p><em><strong>Kerbal Space Program</strong></em> <em>IS</em> awesome, but don’t just take our word for it. The Solar Gamer and some of our good friends are here to sing you a song about it.</p>

Kind of disappointed that my latest Kerbal rocket launch didn't make the cut, but this video is just awesome. I don't think I ever had a chance.

It's great to hear so many of my favorite KSP Youtubers in one video! (And I'm impressed that, for the most part, everyone was in tune!)

Awesome! Hell yes!

What about a longer song with more guys (and girls!) of the community? Who can write down some more lyrics?
Did I see some dev names?! That's awesome!
I still think Xactars version is better.

Kind of disappointed that my latest Kerbal rocket launch didn't make the cut

i like this. Just started to take up an interest in Model Rockets, so was twice as cool for me!
Wow, Damion Rayne and PD. Thats a cool video. Even got some devs in.

Yeah, I was surprised to see PD as well after how all that ended with him. He seemed fairly bitter about the whole situation. Hopefully he's gotten over the situation and starts streaming KSP again, he was an excellent member of the media team and had some of the best tutorials and vids out there.

Oh yeah, totally agree w/the video as well! KSP is just AWESOME!

Nice video, I especially liked the reference to 'Dr Strangelove' in the last shot just before the final title sequence. ;-)

Greets,

Jan

I love this so much it's not even funny! Especially TARDIS and Enterprise.

Edited April 3, 2014 by GregroxMun

so where is the MP3 download? i want! I love the scott manley part. No offense to any of the other youtubes/devs/people in the video, but scott manley has the voice of a manley angel.(see what i did there?) and that's just his talking voice. Loved it!

EDIT: i'm stupid didn't watch till the end. Disregard the first sentence of this post.

Edited April 5, 2014 by Endersmens

hey WE HEAR DANNY'S VOICE !

that of GLaDOS, just as we all suspected.
"I LOVE HOT PLASMA!" -Danny2468, 2014
